official_title: A bill to provide for the study of the Anasazi Trail for potential designation as a national historic trail.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to designate the Anasazi Trail, New Mexico, for study for possible inclusion in such System.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the study of the Anasazi Trail for potential designation as a national historic trail.
